tweet.text: What to make of Soviet leader Konstantin Chernenko, newly elected in February 1984, and his possible agenda? Review this March 1984 Department of State memo assessing possible positions: https://t.co/PFreSCMpI0 https://t.co/CFgMMk1p0V
